name: Maxim
entries: Belt 40. Upon crafting a Belt fed firearm, you additionally gain 1 Belt. Belt fed firearms use a number of rounds equal to how many damage die they roll with their attack. Once a belt is out of ammunition, you can replace and reload the firearm with another loaded belt as an Action. To reload the ammunition in a belt, it requires 1 minute per 10 rounds you are reloading. Belt weapons are prone to jam, and have their misfire score increased by 1.
Loud Loud weapons produce more noise than the average firearm, which may attract or scare other creatures from distances up to 300ft away.
